Uuups documentation

Uuups is a starter theme and an experiment how to bring your theme to the next level.

Documentation in Github

Uuups documentation is also available in the Github.

Read Mythic documentation

This is my playground from Justin Tadlock's starter theme called Mythic. Most of the code is the same but I have small experiments here and there.

Mythic Wiki have lot's of relevant information. Make sure to check it out.
